description:
Eliminate premature wear and the risk of crossloading your belay carabiner. The Bulletproof steel insert prevents sharp edges from forming from your rope or belay device, and the internal spring bar prevents any twisting on your harness. By using unanodized aluminum, Edelrid reduces the water, chemical and electricity use in the manufacturing process.

  • ECO non-anodized aluminum with a steel insert to prevent premature wear
  • Slider locking mechanism is easy to open with one hand
  • Integrated spring bar holds carabiner in place when belaying to prevent cross loading
  • Keylock closure system for easier handling when clipping and unclipping
name: Edelrid HMS Bulletproof ECO Belay Carabiner
